topic.title: How to choose stocks/funds, I lost tens of thousands. . .
topic.body: Do any friends teach me how to choose stocks? I don't want my money to go into other people's pockets.

1602918342_1BKJiQF8pvdQw99D1XpTG2UJ6eno1.body:
> [robione](#comment_604_1DoVPxFrQCDb3grC8Nsn6aACed9o2oiumX): Why do you want to steal from others then? [...]

Hi brother, buying stocks should be a bet...I am a good man
